/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene. A car is parked on the side of the road, adding a touch of everyday life to the image. In the distance, buildings rise, their architecture hinting at the blend of traditional and modern styles that characterize Beijing.
